price: Todo lo que hay en los cielos y en la Tierra glorifica a Dios. Él es el Poderoso, el Sabio.
arabic: سَبَّحَ لِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: sabbaḥa lillahi mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi wahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
